author: unstubbable
message:
Show string values for configured experimental features (#80686)

Follow-up to #74692. We can not only show numbers, but also strings when
printing the configured experimental features in the CLI.

files.patch:
@@ -53,7 +53,11 @@ export function logStartInfo({
             : bold('⨯')
           : '·'
 
-      const suffix = typeof exp.value === 'number' ? `: ${exp.value}` : ''
+      const suffix =
+        typeof exp.value === 'number' || typeof exp.value === 'string'
+          ? `: ${JSON.stringify(exp.value)}`
+          : ''
+
       const reason = exp.reason ? ` (${exp.reason})` : ''
 
       Log.bootstrap(`  ${symbol} ${exp.key}${suffix}${reason}`)
